name: Iberian Inferno
description:
Iberian Inferno is a single-screen action-platformer inspired by the tradition of bullfighting that exists in the Iberian Peninsula. 

Key Features: 

  • The player character is an active Rag-doll; 
  • Fun twist on a topical  subject; 
  • Single-screen chaotic action; 

Controls: 

  • Move: A/D (Left/Right); 
  • Basic Attack: Left Mouse-Click; 
  • Jump: W or Spacebar; 
  • Getting rid of enemies attached to you: E; 

Team: 

  • Bruno Carbonell - Game Designer/ Game Developer; 
  • Diogo Guerreiro - Game Designer/ Animator;  
  • Raquel Correia - Game Designer/ 2D Artist/ Animator;
